title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 882.3 - Payment of bills
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 882.3 - Payment of bills

State Regulations

The amount due for each quarter shall bear interest at the
rate of one percent per month for each day it is unpaid beginning 30 days after
the due date of the quarterly report for the first three quarters and 30 days
after the bill is rendered for the fourth quarter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
882.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
